description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. TIRED OF PLAYING THE SAME OLD ACOUSTIC DRUMS?!  NOW TAKE YOUR CREATIVITY TO THE "NEXT" LEVEL WITH ULTIMATE "ELECTRONIC" DRUMS, AND SOUND LIKE YOUR FAVOURITE ROCK, INDUSTRIAL, ALTERNATIVE OR FUSION DRUMMER!!
description.short: TIRED OF PLAYING THE SAME OLD ACOUSTIC DRUMS?!  NOW TAKE YOUR CREATIVITY TO THE "NEXT" LEVEL WITH ULTIMATE "ELECTRONIC" DRUMS, AND SOUND LIKE YOUR FAVOURITE ROCK, INDUSTRIAL, ALTERNATIVE OR FUSION DRUMMER!!
